name: Delicious - Emily's New Beginning
description: Play Delicious - Emily's New Beginning and enjoy a new phase in Emily's life! Can you help her run Emily's Place together with taking care of a beautiful daughter?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.6 GHZ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 Mb Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 541 MB available space
